lead_paragraph: The explosion struck Qamishli, in the country’s northeast. Separately, Unicef said airstrikes hit four hospitals and a blood bank in Aleppo.

byline.contributor: Maher Samaan contributed reporting from Paris.

headline.main: Blast Kills Dozens in Kurdish-Held Syrian Town; Crisis in Aleppo Worsens

snippet: The explosion struck Qamishli, in the country’s northeast. Separately, Unicef said airstrikes hit four hospitals and a blood bank in Aleppo....
